topic.title: Help?
topic.body:
Hello, 
Is it possible to use .bit + bitmitigate ?

Example:
Im trying to route my .bit traffic through bitmitigate.
But it don't seem to work.
I can add the domain.bit through it, but it isn't forwarding?

Is there anything I'm missing?
I have added bitmitigate's IP/DNS to my .bit domain and Added my .bit IP to bitmitigate's origin IP.

What I'm trying to achieve here are these.
.bit domain ---> bitmitigate -->> to Destination IP.
or
Mask .bit Real IP through VPN? 
I just want to hide my real IP, rather than broadcasting it.

Let me know if anyone can help. I am willing to pay for the service.
